original_text: Now Sennacherib received a report that Tirhakah, the king of Cush, was marching out to fight against him. So he again sent messengers to Hezekiah with this word:
korean_text: 앗수르 왕은 구스 왕 디르하가가 당신과 싸우고자 나왔다 함을 듣고 다시 히스기야에게 사자를 보내며 이르되

sentences.original_text: that Tirhakah, the king of Cush
was marching out to fight against him
So he again sent messengers to Hezekiah
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그가 다시 사자들을 히스기야에게 보내며
